alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Braxton; Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Harrison; Lewis; Upshur (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 12:59AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A line of strong gusty showers will impact portions of southeastern Calhoun, southeastern Doddridge, Gilmer, Lewis, Braxton, northern Upshur, west central Barbour and southern Harrison Counties through 130 AM EST... At 1258 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong gusty showers across north central West Virginia, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buckhannon, Weston, Philippi, Glenville, Sutton, Audra State Park, Gassaway, Jackson Mill, Stonewall Jackson, Cedar Creek State Park, West Milford, Burnsville, Lost Creek, Jane Lew, Flatwoods, Sand Fork, Shock, Millstone, Rosedale and Alum Bridge. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 48 and 112. Route 19 between mile markers 66 and 68. Route 33 between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Barbour; Braxton; Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Harrison; Lewis; Upshur
